The world is counting on you!!!!! Really? You\'re gonna leave the air con on? Why you leave light on eh?! The AC is cooler than you! Save Energy!! Remember to switch off your lights when you are not using it.
Energy Guardian Way to go! You\'ve helped to reduce energy consumption around your school.
Quizzaholic Great work, brainbox. You\'re a champion at completing daily quizzes.
Quiz Commander You\'re on a roll! You continuously complete daily quizzes like clockwork.
Planet Protector Bingo! You\'ve got 3/3 answers correct on a quiz.
Broadcaster You\'ve shared your daily results with different channels.
Social Sergeant You added a friend to your leader board.
Leading Legend Wow! Look at you go! You\'ve ranked in the top 5% of your house.
Trailblazer Leading the way! You\'ve ranked in the top 10% of your friends.(Unlocked when you have 10+ friends)
Ultimate Champion Winning! Your house team has won a cycle.
